info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Latex Colors are concentrated water-based, acrylic colorants for water-based paints like Permacoat Latex Paints, Healthy Home, and Wallguard Dirt Resisting Latex. They mix easily and produce tints from pastel to medium shades with even finishes.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body: Stir well before using. Close container and wash painting tools in soapy water immediately after use.
